description:
While searching for Majo Rika in the Witch World, http://anidb.net/ch14734 [Harukaze Doremi] and her friends are led to the Queen`s Garden where they witness the birth of a witch baby from a flower. Chosen by the Witch Queen as guardians of this newborn child; Doremi, http://anidb.net/ch14735 [Hazuki], http://anidb.net/ch14736 [Aiko], and http://anidb.net/ch14737 [Onpu] are given the opportunity to become witch apprentices once again. Due to the rules of the Witch World, the four girls must now face the difficult challenge of raising a baby in order to recover their magic crystals. Named Hana by Harukaze, the infant possesses great magical power and might become the next Witch Queen.
Source: ANN
